title: B+LNZ Farming for Profit: Regenerative Agriculture in Your Farm System  Alister Moorhead

tasks.task: Attend a pasture species selection field day at Marshdale.
subtasks: Learn about a diverse pasture project with five farmlets.
Discuss the composition of the pasture mix including 28 species.
Understand the rationale behind sowing specific grass and legume species.
Identify the benefits and challenges of low sowing rates for perennial species.
Evaluate the performance of cover crop plants like oats and their impact.
Assess the risks associated with mustard and radish in the mix.
Consider the role of mix components in nitrogen cycling and soil health.
Reflect on the future prospects of the pasture and the project's goals.
